name: Crab Game 2: The Craboratory
description:
Deep in the mountains far away from any major city lies a mysterious laboratory. Within these walls are heinous experiments being carried out for the twisted minds that work there. Among those there is a peculiar scientist by the name of Dr.J. Frayman. Dr.Frayman is the lead researcher on the “crustacean revival project”, however due to extreme oversights the subjects of the project have escaped and have begun making their way towards the outside world. Now Dr.Frayman must try and clean up his mess and prevent his experiment from destroying the world.

Crab game two is a sequel to our teams first game (Pickle on Mars (with Crab)) however it is not necessary to play that game to enjoy this one. It is a hotline miami style shooter (lacking the polish of that game obviously) Shoot, run, and dodge your way through 10 levels all while battling strange mutated crabs and collecting bizarre upgrades along the way.

Your health ticks down with time so you need to be sure to kill more enemies to replenish that health. To exit to the next stage all enemies in the level must be killed, after that you just need to make your way to the elevator.

Controls: W,A,S,D for movement Mouse for aiming Left Mouse to Start game and to shoot E,F,Q to open doors

Credits Crispy: Lead Programmer

Midas: Lead Artist, level designer, and backup programmer

Mardood: Backup artist, concept designer, and sfx/music guy

Prangus: End screen artist

HFM: Boss music designer (haydenmartin.bandcamp.com)
